io

Defined a specific header that is passed to macsylib.io functions.

io API reference

outfile_header

macsyfinder.io.outfile_header(models_fam_name: str, models_version: str, skipped_replicons: list[str] | None = None) → str[source]
Returns:

The first lines of each result file
